additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Aluminum Sesquichlorohydrate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Alkyl Benzoate, Fragrance, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Dimethiconol.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Extremely Flammable Pressurized dispenser: May explode if heated. Keep away from sources of ignition - No smoking. Avoid direct inhalation and prolonged spraying. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50C. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Solvent abuse can kill instantly

description: Powerful 72 Hr protection made for Men. The original Brut scent unites citrus, fougere and musky elements to create a fresh and clean scent that's timeless, iconic & enduring. 72 Hr Antiperspirant Protection Reduced Silicone Formula Australian made and Owned
name: 72Hr Antiperspirant Deodorant Original
